originalText.text: This cake is beautiful and very delicious! The cake is spongy and light while the cream in between layers is flavored nicely. The fruit is also a pairs really nicely with the cake. Maria, the owner of the bakery, is also really sweet and made the ordering process quick! The workers provided the cake topping and added gold glitter on the cake when I picked it up. Overall, highly recommend!

originalText.text: We ordered kinder bueno cake for our baby shower and it was the best cake I‚Äôve had in my life- without exaggeration. Marie had outdone herself. So fresh and yummy, with so many different layers and flavors. All of our guests were raving about it and wanted to know where we got the cake from. Thank you Marie!

originalText.text:
Ohhh! I‚Äôm so happy I decided to walk in to this cute little bakery and ordered my cake with Marie.
I loved the cake. It was so stunning looking and delicious.
I really ordered it last minute and
Marie and her team were so accommodating, kind and professional. They definitely took so much stress and worries away from me. They said they will make the cake the way I wanted and oh they definitely did and did even better than I expected.
All our guests love the cake and it was almost all gone.
Definitely, coming back to Les Gateaux De Marie for the cake for my next event ü•≥üëèüèª

originalText.text: Our experience with Marie was beyond great! She has made the most amazing safari cake and all the sweet treats for my baby‚Äôs 1st birthday. She also made sure it was delivered and set up beautifully. I was so touched with her personal involvement. She showed us such a passion and kindness. Our celebration wouldn‚Äôt have been the same without her beautiful sweets. I‚Äôm so grateful as a mom to see our little ones special celebration come to fruition thanks to Marie.

originalText.text: Maria was a pleasure to work with. She was able to take my cake order very last minute, which I was so grateful about. I sent her an inspiration photo, and she went above and beyond. Usually, the beautiful cakes I‚Äôve had from other bakeries don‚Äôt taste so great, but this was one of the most delicious cakes I‚Äôve ever had. you can clearly taste it was made with quality ingredients. It made my friends birthday extra special, and she absolutely loved it as well. Thank you Mariaüíó
